name: THE ISLAND: A learning game for everyone.
blurb: Epic Learning Interactive Game for Kids.

rewards.reward: Thanks! ============================== You have contributed into making this Learning Project a Reality and you name will be stamped in our credits. Thanks for your support!

Thanks, Special Credits & Forum Access
==============================



At any reward level you will have access to exclusive backers contests, polls, surveys and much more. Your opinion matters and we want you as involved in the project as you want to be. If you are a teacher, pedagogue or just an education lover you can help us create an even better learning tool with your ideas, designs and techniques. 

Your name will appear in the game credits and will be screamed out loud by one of our pirate voice actors to be remembered for every one of our players for as long as it takes for the next name to be called. Your name will also be added on our Island Project Wall.

Digital concept art.
==============================

Digital concept art of the game, signed by the artist. This means there will be a moment in which one of our artist will have you in mind while creating a character, object or landscape. Each piece will be unique so you will be able to brag about it every time you see it on the game. (Your name will still be yelled out loud, maybe even with a louder tone).

Physical Game Box
==============================

Your own physical version of the game series for you to enjoy wherever you are, even if you are lost in an Island that has no WiFi. (We do not ship to stranded islands, Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

Original Handmade Drawing. 
==============================

Our artists will make an original framed handmade drawing (size A5) for you to enjoy. You might even choose who you want making that art piece for you.
(Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

Limited Edition of the Physical Game Box. 
==============================

If you like Game Boxes, you will love what we have prepared for you. This reward is available for only a few, and you will soon see why. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

Explorer\u2019s Journal. \r\n==============================\r\nEach one of our adventurer\u2019s has been sailing the ocean with an explorer\u2019s Journal, in it they have, not only the game\u2019s manual, but exclusive content, games challenges, art and some peculiar proposals. This Journal takes the experience to a whole new level. So let us present to you, your own printed version of the Explorer\u2019s Journal with exclusive content. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

Explorer’s Journal Limited Edition. 
==============================

If the Explorer’s Journal sounds neat, add some originals, sketches, notes and some interesting surprises from our artists to take the experience even further. The adventure gets more interesting each day. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

Create your own puzzle Challenge. 
==============================

Are you a puzzle freak? Work with our designers to come up with an original puzzle challenge that will be introduced in the game. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

Printed Art Book. 
==============================

Have a printed art book with originals made by our artist and not so artists. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

The voice of a supporting role. 
==============================

Be the voice of one of the supporting roles in the story, work hand in hand with our music designer to achieve the best character impersonation possible and experience the sensation of being recognized by others as THE pirate. You may also name your character as long it is a “Piraty” one. (As long as you can provide you own high quality recordings. Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

I heard you voice before… 
==============================

Be the voice of one of the main characters in the story, this will mean long hours of hard work but there is nothing like being part of the design of a game. (As long as you can provide you own high quality recordings, Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

Someone looks like you\r\n==============================\r\nYour physical resemblance in one of the characters in the story. It doesn\u2019t matter if you are the prettiest person in the world we will manage to fit you into one of our ugliest characters. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

Be the villain. 
==============================

We know everyone wants to be the villain sometimes, so here is your chance. Be the one that makes our heroes sweat, suffer and even get stuck in our story. You will have a say in the villains main traits, your resemblance will be embedded in the character and you may even be able to add the characters voice (As long as you can provide you own high quality recordings, Check the reward section of the page for more details.)

Be the villain’s sidekick. 
==============================

If being the villain is cool, being the sidekick of a villain is even cooler. Be the dorky, funny, kind of awkward sidekick of our villain. Design you own trademark phrase to be known to everyone. (Check the reward section of the page for more details.)
